alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Northern Ware; Pierce (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 10:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN COFFEE...NORTHERN PIERCE...NORTH CENTRAL WARE...BACON AND SOUTHERN APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 PM EDT... At 1052 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Alma to 6 miles west of Douglas. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph, excessive cloud-to-ground lightning, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Alma, Surrency, Nicholls, West Green, and New Lacy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Coffee; Northern Ware; Pierce
